about_the_game:
Digital Art Gallery for Eastern Exorcist, enjoy over 140 pages full of artworks and in-game character designs.


How to find the Artbook location in files: In the game library of the Steam client, right-click and select the game [Eastern Exorcist]-[Properties]-[DLC]-check the box to install, the Digital Artbook PDF will be downloaded to the game's local file, enter the game's local folder, and select the PDF file to view the artbook!

content_descriptors.notes: Slight horror elements. (Ghost and skeletons etc, for monster designs)

detailed_description:
Digital Art Gallery for Eastern Exorcist, enjoy over 140 pages full of artworks and in-game character designs.


How to find the Artbook location in files: In the game library of the Steam client, right-click and select the game [Eastern Exorcist]-[Properties]-[DLC]-check the box to install, the Digital Artbook PDF will be downloaded to the game's local file, enter the game's local folder, and select the PDF file to view the artbook!
developers: Wildfire Game（无锡野火数字科技有限公司）
name: Eastern Exorcist - Digital Artbook

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64位
  • Processor: Intel i3+
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 750
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 推荐分辨率 1080p, 16:9

short_description: Eastern Exorcist is a stunning 2D side-scrolling action RPG set in a fantasy eastern world with vicious spirits and monsters. Play as a skilled exorcist against chaotic evil to fight your way through the brutal world, and experience different stories of joy and sorrow.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
